item.description: File Conversions Convert ANSI to UTF-8
This script was created to solve the problem of AWS Glue jobs failing because our files in S3 were stored as ANSI format.

item.title: Latent Space | Christian Payne
item.description: Latent Space is my newsletter where I publish about things I find useful and want to share. The intitial goal of this project was to start down the path of creating value for others to find and utilize in their own lives.
